storyInfo: Before she leaves Laterano, Fiammetta must first meet with someone. That someone tells her: The life you lead right now is pointless.

attributes.content: Bang!
Whoa! That's amazing! You broke another record!
attributes.name: Lively Child

attributes.content: Hmph. Not bad, for a grown-up.
attributes.name: Stubborn Child

attributes.content: Congratulations! This plush is your prize!
attributes.name: Candid Stall Owner

attributes.content: Hell yeah!
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hey, Dawn Destroyer, you give this a try, too.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Liberi lady, is your name really Dawn Destroyer? That's so cool!
attributes.name: Lively Child

attributes.content: I think it's weird. It does sound a little cool, though. You good at shooting, too?
attributes.name: Stubborn Child

attributes.content: First off, my name's not Dawn Destroyer.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Our beloved leader awarded you that codename herself! You should wear it with pride.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Secondly, we're adults. Breaking records at a balloon shooting booth isn't anything impressive.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Come on, give it a try. It's a toy gun that works on springs. Even a Liberi can handle it.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Thirdly, the attendant looks pissed.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: No, not at all. This is business. You win some, you lose some. Now, my Liberi friend, surely you're up for a try?
attributes.name: Still-Trying-to-be-Candid Stall Owner

attributes.content: Ugh... alright.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Bang!
Whoa, the grand prize.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You win some, you lose some. Right?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Whoa! An all-you-can-eat coupon, good for a whole year! Works at all the dessert shops in Laterano, too!
attributes.name: Lively Child

attributes.content: A-Amazing! You gotta be a sniper or something at the Guards, right?!
attributes.name: Stubborn Child

attributes.content: Are you a big shot from a monastery?
attributes.name: Lively Child

attributes.content: Y-You wouldn't happen to be... working for His Holiness...?
attributes.name: Not-So-Candid Stall Owner

attributes.content: Thanks for the coupon, senior. I won't complain about how you tampered with the toy gun.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Um, ma'am... I-If you don't mind... would you... would you tell me your name...?
attributes.name: Trying-to-Smile-Anyway Stall Owner

attributes.content: Me? I thought you guys already knew.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: My name is...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Dawn—
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Destroyer!!!
attributes.name: Children

attributes.content: Dawn—
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Destroyer!!!
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mostima, are you done?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But you were having fun too.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I was just...!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Whatever, suit yourself.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Giving in already? I thought you'd put up more of a fight.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: There's no point in putting up a fight you can't win, and I was never going to win, trying to argue with you.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: So? How does it feel to be back home? Good?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's not so bad, if it's a once in a while thing.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You're actually pretty fond of Laterano, aren't you?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Who isn't? Even an idiot can tell Laterano's a paradise.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Even though you aren't allowed to stay in the city if you have Oripathy, your Lateran citizenship gets you out of most trouble.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Of course, it's a whole different story if you're unlucky enough to have sugar sensitivity, or if you're fallen.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Hey, I like it here too.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You like it everywhere. Honestly, you don't seem to ever care where you are.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: There's a saying for that. 'Going with the flow.'
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Right, right. You're a real charming one, Miss Nuncio, never one to stop in one place.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But you aren't like me, Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You have a choice.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: So you should at least go meet that guest of ours. He's waited a long time already.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I've got nothing to say to a Gun-Knight.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: How about to your teacher, then?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's been years since I graduated.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What about your loving nonno, then?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: That's just what he calls himself.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Tell you the truth, I really don't want to fight over a gal with a Gun-Knight. If I end up on their bad side, I might get myself a weird codename too.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Anyway, now that we've been everywhere worth going in the city, I'm gonna wait for you outside.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hey, Mostima! Mostima!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Grr, that bitch. She used Arts on me, didn't she? Why am I moving so slowly?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: My opinion of Mostima has just gone up a little bit. At the very least, she's a good kid who knows to respect her elders.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Gun-Knight Patrizion, it's been a while.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Yes it has—
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The light in the darkness, the shadow in the morning light, my most beloved student, Dawn Destroyer!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I am... honored.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fia! Fia!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Looking just the same as always.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Me? I so rarely hear such sweet talk out of you.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: No, I'm talking about the monastery. You're wearing a helmet, Reverend Gun-Knight.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: As if I have a choice? Apostolic Knights are required to wear full armor on the job.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You're on the job?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What? I can't come see my beloved granddaughter just because I'm on the job? That would be outrageous!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Reverend Gun-Knight, you're a Sankta, and I'm a Liberi. We are not related by blood.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Enough! My Fia would never speak to me like this! When your parents left you in my care, you wouldn't have dared to be so impolite!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You were only so tall back then, like a little pea...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I was already seven when I first met you.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Do you remember how I taught you how to aim, how to shoot, how to calculate a bullet's trajectory? I feel like it was just last year...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You were always pestering me to teach you how to use a gun, then, hah, you always came crying after you blew yourself up!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: It's only been a few short years, and now everyone everywhere knows my little Fia as the Hardship Overseer... No, the Sticky Shimmering... Weevil? What's your new codename again?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: ...Dawn Destroyer.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Ah, right. I'm getting on in years. Even though I remembered it just a minute ago... Can't you settle on a single codename?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Wasn't it you miserable old men who decided I had to change my codename every month?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Did that happen? I don't recall.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Can I request to have that requirement lifted, then?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Lemuen is in charge of you, now. I've got no say.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Anyway! You were so adorable then, but you couldn't be more dull these days. Even the movies you bring back are getting more and more boring.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Hm... Maybe except the 'One-Armed Chainsaw Guy.' That gets three out of five stars from me.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: —Phew.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: So, my most respected, beloved Reverend Gun-Knight Patrizion. What did you summon me for?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm very busy, and I still have a lot of missions that I need to carry out.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What missions? Strolling around the streets with Mostima?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: My mission is to keep an eye on the fallen angel Mostima, to make sure she does not leak any confidential information to anyone.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Enough, Fia. We don't have any secrets so important to keep under wraps.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Besides, even if we did, how would you determine what must be kept and what's okay to reveal? You say you're keeping an eye on her, but how do you decide what crosses the line, and what's okay?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I'm just following...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fiammetta, I'll be honest with you.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The life you lead right now is pointless.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You have no right to judge my life.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I do. After all, I am the head of the monastery, your teacher, and your guardian. Above all, I know what you could've been.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Right now, you're diddling away your time, idling all day, doing nothing. Worse, you aren't even enjoying your life.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: But... Mostima needs my help.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fia, it's not Mostima who needs you. You are the one who needs her. You've found yourself an excuse to follow her around.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: This is Mostima we are talking about. She knows how to take care of her own problems.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Of course, when she tries on clothes, she might need someone help her with the zippers on the back.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Patrizion, you...!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Angry? Finally, you found yourself some backbone. You should know I had very high hopes for you.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: After all, you're my most beloved student. You were the first Liberi who could've become an Apostolic Knight.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You could've taken on so much more responsibility.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Now, even if I don't make it sound so scary, it's actually pretty fun to be a Gun-Knight! You're not a Sankta, and you don't have this annoying halo over your head. The helmets wouldn't give you a headache.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You can't wield a gun, but we can get you a huge-ass grenade launcher just as easily.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Most importantly, Gun-Knights don't have to pay out of pocket when they blow up a street!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Fia, you have both talent and experience. You should come back. Laterano needs you.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: But I don't want to be a Gun-Knight.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: That's not what you told me when you were little. You begged me to train you so that you could become...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: ...an adult. Just so I could know the choices I had open to me.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And you chose to follow Mostima around?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: At first, it might actually have been guilt that drove me to follow her around. I felt I was partly responsible for her becoming fallen. I was worried she would be so depressed that she'd truly fall.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You didn't understand her well enough, then.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Right, haha. It's Mostima we're talking about...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Then, I started to think. Andoain was bound to go looking for her one day. If I stayed by her side, I would eventually get to settle my score with him.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And you finally found him at the Summit of Nations two days ago.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: It wasn't enough. He got away. If I see him again, I will take him in myself.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Then you truly have no reason to keep following Mostima around. You could become an executor. That way, you can travel across the land on this case.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: No, that's not what I meant.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: After I got back this time, I suddenly realized Mostima and I have been so many places and met so many people. Set aside all objectives and purposes, and that in itself is my choice.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You said it yourself: even an idiot can tell Laterano's a paradise.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Right, but if you've never been away from home, how would you know what it means to come home? There are lots of places that stir my heart more than Laterano, but there will only ever be one Laterano.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Besides, this journey actually isn't all that bad.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: It's true. I don't enjoy my life.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm just going through it.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: That's not going to lead to any growth. You're just suffering for no reason.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Fia, all of us want you to stay. We can easily get you a seat on the Gun-Knights' Tribunal.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I'd even be okay with it if you wanted to go nuts and become a cardinal like Lemuen. I could talk to His Holiness about it.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: It's a lot more work than being an Apostolic Knight, but it's much better than having to bustle around outside.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Or I could simply order you to stay.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You won't. You're you, after all.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Right, because I watched you grow up.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: It feels terrible to be old.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I can feel myself going downhill, day after day. Every morning, I wake up, and I find myself worse off than the day before, and everything is leaving me behind...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: My friends are dying, one by one. My students are scattered all across the world. The clerics simply respect me; they rarely come talk to me.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: It's boring, Fia. It's very boring. All I can do these days is chew over what's left of those days gone by, until nothing is left but some fuzzy feelings, to the point that I forget what I was trying to remember in the first place.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Eight years ago, you were there outside my door when I was packing.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: How'd you figure?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Because you left a long list of movies in my bag.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Oh, now that you mention it, I did do that.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I was obsessed with the Wrankwood blockbusters at the time. I only let you go because I was too caught up in the movies, and I started regretting it the very next day!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You only regretted it because you realized that even if I was going to bring you any of those movies, it wouldn't be for several years, didn't you?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: That's my girl. You know me well.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Hahahahaha.
attributes.name: Fiammetta & Patrizion

attributes.content: Haha, you just want someone to take over your work, so you can hole up in the monastery and watch movies, don't you?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Maybe, but I'll eventually run out of movies to watch.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: When are you leaving this time?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: In a bit.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Why not stay a couple more days? There's going to be another blindfolded handstand shooting match in just a few.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I'll pass. I watched more than enough of those back when I was a kid. I even entered one.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I remember that. You got first place. I still have the trophy in the back.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Really? You do?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Looks like I'll have to watch the match alone.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Don't make yourself sound like such a poor, neglected grandparent. We both know you'll have the friars with you.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Sure enough.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I heard they're making a new One-Armed Chainsaw movie. I'll bring you a copy the next time I come back.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: When will that be?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Probably next year.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: The movie will be so old by then.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: At least you'll actually get to watch it.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: It's getting late.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Fia!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What is it, old man?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Forget it. Never you mind. Go!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Well, then. Reverend Gun-Knight Patrizion, I shall take my leave now.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Goodbye, I await your next visit—
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Dawn Destroyer.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I will burn your whole monastery down.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fia, it's a joke! Just a joke!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Am I really this unlucky?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hah! A Sankta all by her lonesome! Looks like we're in luck!
attributes.name: Ferocious Sarkaz Bandit

attributes.content: Tell me, how do you want to die?
attributes.name: Ferocious Sarkaz Bandit

attributes.content: How come this Sankta has horns?
attributes.name: Ferocious Sarkaz Bandit

attributes.content: Hah, who cares?! We'll find out after we kill her!
attributes.name: Ferocious Sarkaz Bandit

attributes.content: Hey, I'm in a bit of a hurry. Can we not do this?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Begging for mercy now? Not a chance! It's because of you Sankta bastards that my boss—
attributes.name: Ferocious Sarkaz Bandit

attributes.content: What the—?!
attributes.name: Ferocious Sarkaz Bandit

attributes.content: Aagh!
attributes.name: Ferocious Sarkaz Bandit

attributes.content: Now do you know how much work it takes to make sure everything's smooth sailing when you're out doing whatever?
Whoa! No way! It's the Dawn—
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You aren't tired of that joke yet?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm getting there.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I went on ahead since I figured that'd take you a couple more days. I mean, the old man came to take his granddaughter in.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It didn't cross your mind that I could just end up staying?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: No way.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You still gotta make sure I don't spill any secrets.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: The old man has a message for you. Apparently he wants to do a movie marathon the next time we're back in Laterano.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: W-What the hell? There's just the two of them!
attributes.name: Panicking Sarkaz Bandit

attributes.content: Let's get them!
attributes.name: Hot-Headed Sarkaz Bandit

attributes.content: Well, I'm honored.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I will think about it.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Guess I'll take a stroll.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Hm? An all-you-can-eat dessert coupon? Good for a whole year?! What is this doing in my pocket?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Did I win a prize? Perhaps His Holiness gave it to me a couple days ago?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Oh, who cares. Time to stuff my face with sweets!
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: She'll be back by the time this certificate expires...
attributes.name: Patrizion
